channel.title: Are you leaving? Are you coming back?
channel.description:
How about you post here. This thread should be used if you are either: [ul][li]leaving[/li] [li]coming[/li][/ul] This will prevent an ungodly number of tpoics that almost seem to fill the forum up :eek: [reverse puschology] don't sticky this :| ;D [/reverse pyshcology] Also, If you feel you are special, go ahead and make your own thread, but I think this thread is a much better idea! mission statment:
why do people feel the need to tell the world they arnt gonna be here for a weekend or they are leaving or Oh em gee im grounded, bottom line 98 percent of the community dosnt care
from miss sibalosft

item.title: Are you leaving? Are you coming back?
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

[quote=“Weibs, post:19, topic:18931”]So that people will have to look through over 10 pages of spam to find out who’s leaving?

Sounds like a great idea.[/quote]
yes, and eventually this thread won’t be needed and then they eill relize no one cares.

Read full topic

item.title: Are you leaving? Are you coming back?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote author=PaulT link=topic=28699.msg329825#msg329825 date=1161261515]

why doesnt mopar just make a whole new catergory like Sythe.org for people that and coming (ccan intoduce themselves) and for people who are leaving (can say their goodbyes). Confused

It’s nice to just have a general discussion forum where people can do and say what they like freely, without worrying they are in the wrong forum.

Also, the nature of the forum is such that shitty threads quickly go off topic and turn random. Which, is an improvement, most likely, on the original content. Since an introduction/goodbye forum would be full of shitty threads, they would all go off topic. For an example of how randomness is superior to shittieness, reread your question and my response, and compare it to the first post of this thread. Randomness, and shittieness. Randomness, shittieness. Hmmm.

from miss =]

You know you can type:
[quote=X
where X is who you want to say you’re quoting, right? (obviously add another bracket…it keeps autocompleting my tags :()
[/quote] ya im just lazy like that tho lol

Read full topic
item.source: Are you leaving? Are you coming back?
